Module ntnu.idatt1002
Package ntnu.idatt1002.model

Class User

java.lang.Object
ntnu.idatt1002.model.User
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class User
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
A class which functions as a user of the application This class contains the basic method of any given user Setters methods automatically changes the savefile of this userobject
See Also:
